law.text: All reuse water services shall be installed, extended, replaced or repaired by City forces from the City's main to the property line unless otherwise permitted by the Director of Public Utilities; provided, no such permission shall be granted for work within the corporate limits in public street rights-of-way except by licensed utility contractors. All reuse water connections in new developments shall be the responsibility of the developer and at his expense in accordance with City standards and specifications. (Ord. No. 2006-100, ยง1, 9-19-06)
